body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount Compatible with R1/2/3/3Plus/4/Most Video Doorbell, Adjustable Video Doorbell Bracket Holder Not Block Doorbell Sensor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Anti-theft Design】 This doorbell mount is designed with a hidden anti-theft screw at the bottom to prevent your video doorbell from being stolen, Doorbell bracket covers are made of plastic and metal materials, durable, safe and reliable,providing a safer environment for your places. Ideal for houses, apartments, hotels, dormitories and etc. It doesn't block the video doorbell motion sensor.

【Compatible Video Doorbells 】Our Anti-Theft Doorbell Holder compatible with video doorbell 1/2/3/4 generation and 2020 Release（Six models in total）. Compatible with most kind of inward opened door, left or right inward opened door (Don't fit outward opened door and security door). Note:The thickness of the door must be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches（door Gap Width > 0.06inches). Before ordering, be sure to measure the thickness and gap of the door to ensure a proper fit.

【Adjustable Angle】The doorbell bracket can be manually adjusted left and right horizontally by 45 °. You can choose your ideal angle to get a better view, and can better observe visitors and things outside the door.

【3 Types of Installation】Two ways of No-drilling installations:The first is using included strong adhesive 3M tape attached the bracket to the wall/door, the second is just clamping the mount on the door. The third is using screws to install the doorbell mount to the wall.

【Package Include】1x video doorbell mount, installation instructions and various installation accessories. If you encounter any problems with the product or installation, please contact us and we will resolve it for you immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and secure install
reviews.reviewText: While waiting for my Ring doorbell to arrive, I tested this out (fake Ring shown inside). It uses one of the best features of the Ring doorbell, the fact it can be operated by battery (unlike Simplisafe). There are several mounting options if you don't want to screw into your door (or other mounting surface) and with the attached bracket it can be removed without a trace, as shown. You could even take this with you to an AirBnB if you wanted.It comes with the tools necessary to install, including the Torx security screw that securely holds the Ring in the holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were unclear but that’s what youtube is for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We feel safer now!
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell camera mount helps us keep an eye on our home. I love it since it doesn't require drilling holes on the door! It fits the door camera just right. It arrived on time, was nicely packed.The material it is made of is very good and sturdy - it was very easy to install - it's easy to remove the camera to charge - highly recommended!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits just right!
reviews.reviewText: This base fits and supports my Ring camera. It does not look bulky at all, installation was easy. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It didn't work for me.
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately it didn't work for me. I got it for a Blink, which it looked like it would work for in the pictures. After using some thin foam I got it to sit firmly. However, I came to learn that my door is just too flush. The one area I could securely attach it, this won't attach there because the screws aren't designed to mount side ways or at an angle. Which I'd have to do. There was no way whatsoever to install this. I really tried. It was just too thick. The tightening bracket also seemed to bend at an angle as I tightened it into the door, prior to learning it wouldn't work. I wish this came with an adjustable length bracket. That would've worked well. Or the option to rotate where the screws will align and screw in. Something along those lines would've worked for me in the only compatible area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount proves to be a heavy-duty solution for securing your video doorbell. Compatible with various models, including R1, R2, R3, R3Plus, and R4, this adjustable bracket holder ensures a stable and customized installation. Its robust construction provides confidence in deterring theft or tampering. The convenience of compatibility with most video doorbells adds to its appeal. If you prioritize security and durability in mounting your video doorbell, this anti-theft mount is a reliable choice for safeguarding your perspective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT WORK WITH BLINK!
reviews.reviewText: Though it is pictured in the description with a green checkmark, this does not work with Blink cameras. I have another of these for the front door & it came with foam that makes it adjustable to the Blink, but this one does not. Fortunately I have an uncle who needs a camera for his front porch who already uses the Ring system, will be giving this to him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I bought the wrong case
reviews.reviewText: The case packaging and material look like it’s of good quality. I bought the wrong case tho and it didn’t fit my camera.
